title: Bypass restrict of member subscription to use custom background in https://3d.cs.money without prime subscription

profile.name: CS Money
profile.about: CS:GO trading platform that helps people to trade, buy, sell and search for the best skins and deals they could possibly find.

vulnerability_information:
## Summary:
In website https://3d.cs.money you need to subscribe prime to have a custom background for skin 

{F999661}

But with this vulnerability, we can use custom background without any fee required



## Steps To Reproduce:
[add details for how we can reproduce the issue]

- Grab a build of skin
- Save it. Modify request


- Change the background parameter in json to the link of custom background you want


PoC
https://3d.cs.money/item/xALqKJVBdC

## Impact

Bypass restrict of member subscription

In website https://3d.cs.money you need to subscribe prime to have a custom background for skin

But with this vulnerability, we can use custom background without any fee required

Hey!
First 5 days of prime is free for all first time.
You can simply activate it, and decline recurring payment in paypal immediately, so no money would be charged on the 5th day.
